getValue

Class NPCValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • getValue.NPCValue

  • public class NPCValue
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to obtain stats about an NPC. Given the NPC's name and the location of the server database, a string with the specific stat will be returned.
    Author:
    Nicholas Ingalls

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NPCValue(java.lang.String data, java.lang.String npcName)
      Constructs a new object with a string containing the database location and a string containing the username.

      • getDrop

        public java.lang.String getDrop()
        Used to obtain whether or not the NPC drops special items These special items are contained in the ~root~/drop/ folder
        Returns:
        A String containing "true" or "false"
